metadata.name: The Immortal Pass #1
metadata.description: The Immortal Pass is your entry into a world where your avatar journeys through an exploration of all that comes alive after dark, leading into a virtual collect-to-earn Immortal Universe. Each Pass will reveal a living work of art. A dynamic, bespoke coffin that opens after dark and closes before sunrise, based on your current location. If you re lucky, you may even witness the Opening of your coffin.
